html: CAMO NINJA DAD all the way live... Patty sewed me up a camo ninja mask back in 84’. Of course she saved everything I have ever had in my life and sent it for Kodah. He isn’t quite ready for the ninja lifestyle. Eventually he will embrace his Ninja blood and this family heirloom.pic.twitter.com/LItNGDLj31
